process_dataset¶

Toolbox for processing raw data collected from the SensorLogger app and the MGD77T format.

Functions

find_periods(mask)

Find the start and stop indecies from a boolean mask.

m77t_to_csv(data)

Formats a .m77t file in a Pandas data frame to a more useful representation.

main()

Command line interface for processing the raw datasets collected by the Sensor Logger App or NOAA datasets in the mgd77t format.

process_mgd77_dataset(folder_path, output_path)

Recursively search through a given folder to find .m77t files.

process_sensor_logger_dataset(folder)

Process the raw .csv files recorded from the SensorLogger app.

save_sensor_logger_dataset(imu, ...[, ...])

Saves the processed sensor logger data.

split_dataset(df, periods)

Split a dataframe into subsections based on the given periods.
